attributes.action: Force Boris Johnsons’ resignation due to the failure in his duty of care.
attributes.additional_details: We need a competent leader to guide us through these unprecedented times and Johnson is not that. He reacted too late to the pandemic and that is why we’re in the situation we are today. He boasted that he shook hands with COVID patients on the day SAGE warned him not to which resulted in him catching COVID himself. Even he isnt following his own rules so how does he expect us to, New Zealand are back to normalitity due to competency and confidence in their leadership.
attributes.background: The PM has failed in his duty of care towards the country he has not done everything he could to limit COVID deaths, he told us to ‘be patriotic’ and go to the pub and also lowered social distancing to atleast 1m when intoxicated. He has lost the dressing room.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
